activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from my database

source.sqlReaderQuery:
USE [WideWorldImporters];
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' and TABLE_NAME like 'Person%'

properties.description: On prem SQL DB to Azure Migration

activities.name: Copy data from Onprem to cloud

preCopyScript.value:
@{concat( 'CREATE TABLE ', item().Schema,'.', item().TableName, '(
	[PersonID] [int] NULL,
	[LastName] [varchar](255) NULL,
	[FirstName] [varchar](255) NULL,
	[Address] [varchar](255) NULL,
	[City] [varchar](255) NULL
)')}

dependsOn.activity: Copy data from Onprem to cloud

activities.name: Logic App web to send email

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dinid as string,
		name as string,
		age as string,
		homecountry as string,
		iplteam as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceinputfile
source(output(
		dinid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		HomeCountry as string,
		iplteam as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceDbtable
sourceinputfile derive(hash = toBinary(md5(dinid+iplteam)),
		id = toInteger(dinid)) ~> computehash
computehash, sourceDbtable lookup(id == sourceDbtable@dinid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> checkdimid
checkdimid split(isNull(sourceDbtable@dinid),
	!isNull(sourceDbtable@dinid),
	disjoint: false) ~> Newrecordsplit@(Newrecords, Updaterecord)
Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Newrecordsplit@Newrecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dinid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		HomeCountry as string,
		iplteam as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		dinid = id,
		Name = Newrecordsplit@Newrecords@name,
		Age = Newrecordsplit@Newrecords@age,
		HomeCountry = Newrecordsplit@Newrecords@homecountry,
		iplteam = Newrecordsplit@Newrecords@iplteam
	)) ~> Azsink
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dinid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		HomeCountry as string,
		iplteam as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dinid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		dinid = Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord@dinid,
		Name = Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord@name,
		Age = Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord@age,
		HomeCountry = Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord@homecountry,
		iplteam = Newrecordsplit@Updaterecord@iplteam
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	ErrorMsg as string
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Error = $ErrorMsg) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['error.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		ItemType as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		OrderPriority as string,
		OrderID as short,
		Unitssold as short,
		Unitprice as short,
		UnitCost as short,
		TotalRevenue as integer,
		TotalCost as integer,
		TotalProfit as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> ExcelSource
ExcelSource pivot(groupBy(ItemType),
	pivotBy({Sales Channel}),
	PivotTotalRev = sum(TotalRevenue),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivotsales
Pivotsales derive(PivotTotalRevp1 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp1')),
		PivotTotalRevp10 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp10')),
		PivotTotalRevp12 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp12')),
		PivotTotalRevp13 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp13')),
		PivotTotalRevp14 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp14')),
		PivotTotalRevp2 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp2')),
		PivotTotalRevp3 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp3')),
		PivotTotalRevp4 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp4')),
		PivotTotalRevp5 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp5')),
		PivotTotalRevp6 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp6')),
		PivotTotalRevp8 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp8')),
		PivotTotalRevp9 = toLong(byName('PivotTotalRevp9'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivot.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Persons]',
	format: 'query') ~> Sourcetb2
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Persons1]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcetb1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		PersonID = Sourcetb2@PersonID,
		LastName = Sourcetb2@LastName,
		FirstName = Sourcetb2@FirstName,
		Address = Sourcetb2@Address,
		City = Sourcetb2@City,
		LastName2 = sourcetb1@LastName,
		FirstName2 = sourcetb1@FirstName,
		Address2 = sourcetb1@Address,
		City2 = sourcetb1@City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sourcetb2, sourcetb1 join(Sourcetb2@PersonID == sourcetb1@PersonID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dinid as integer,
		Name as string,
		Age as integer,
		HomeCountry as string,
		iplteam as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> target

source(output(
		name as string,
		location as string,
		satellites as string[],
		goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as string, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as string)[]))[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(goods.customers),
	mapColumn(
		customers = goods.customers
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Flatternjson.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
